question: Matt places cookies on some plates. Each plate can hold 29 cookies. If he has 316 cookies and 7 plates, how many cookies won't he be able to place on the plate?
answer:
Matt will be able to place a total of 29*7 = <<29*7=203>>203 cookies.
Therefore, there are 316 - 203 = <<316-203=113>>113 cookies that he won't be able to place on the plate.
#### 113
